comment: Great teacher. She is very understanding and gives many extra credit assignments. Make sure you attend her class because she takes role and it counts toward your grade.

Mrs. Miller is one of my favorite teachers. She is great at making hard concepts easier to understand.  She is very helpful and you couldnt ask for a more reasonable instructor.  I would highly recommend her.

Do the extra credit and an A is no problem. The questions on the test are made by the people who make the book and are very unclear and hard only because they are worded to trip you up. I made an 99 point something, if I had not done the extra credit I would have had a low B.
